name: Cauldron & Potions
description:
Game proposal made in 48h for Game Jam + 2021

   Come along with our brave warrior, to fight against a terrible demon that is haunting the castle, help her with your great potions, adventure in this hardcore rogue-like game.

░ ░ ░░░  ☼  ░░░ ░ ░

The Basic of the game is a mechanic of discovering combinations of elements.

Potion Craft + Loop Hero inspired mechanics

  • Mix the ingredients any way you like, but beware of the results!
  • Some combinations can help the character or attack the enemy, discover and carefully decorate recipes
  • Defeat as many enemies as possible, the further you get, the closer you will be to the castle!
  • discover by playing the universe of some elements and alchemical bases and how they can help you on your journey (and hinder your enemies)

History and Art

  • The history was inpired by some fantasy animes like Re:Zero and Shield Hero
  • 1 Song + Original Sound Effects!

░ ░░  ☼  ░░ ░

Controls Move IngredientsMousePour potion on enemyMouseExit Esc Credits
